title: Machine Learning-Based Magnesium Alloy Reverse Engineering Education Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Materials Science Knowledge, Understanding of Statistics/Data Analysis, and Programming Fundamentals (C++/Python)
context.additional_context: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment utilizing individual learning devices, experiencing alloy design processes via VR simulations

learning_goals: One can explain the reverse design process utilizing machine learning models (ANN, PSO) in magnesium alloy design
One can analyze the correlation between input variables (alloy elements/process conditions) and output performance metrics in a simulated environment
One can propose new magnesium alloy combinations that meet target performance through the application of the RMLDM framework
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
